text: why is there still no access to CTAs in the api? Our blog is hosted in another CMS. We'd like to give users a dropdown off all available HubSpot CTAs and then insert the embed code for the one they choose.  I see forum posts for this from at least a couple years ago and it's still not available.

^ from what I understand, the way CTAs are being formatted as data objects are being re-evaluated, and so it makes sense that HS wouldn't want to create an API around these objects until that structure is formalized. I'm sure it will become available at a later date
